actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to require that 1 percent of any funds appropriated for the construction of certain public buildings be used for artwork for such buildings.

summary.text: Amends the Public Buildings Act of 1959 to require that one percent of any funds appropriated for the construction of specified public buildings be used for artwork for such buildings.

titles.title: A bill to require that 1 percent of any funds appropriated for the construction of certain public buildings be used for artwork for such buildings.
